QuestionTxt: From what you know, do you think it is true or not true that the health care (reform) legislation will create these so called 'death panels' (or government organizations that will and will not receive health services when they are certainly ill)?
SubPopulation: Asked of those who have heard a lot/a little about this (86%)
SurveySponsor: Pew Research Center for the People & the Press
SourceDoc: Pew Weekly News Interest Index Poll
